body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
If parent cron workflow starts child workflow and child workflow fails, then the status of parent workflow will remain as `ContinuedAsNew`. This makes it hard for users to see that there is actually a failure. On WebUI they have to navigate to Summary page and find the failure from the Result field
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11838981/118030904-be68e880-b31a-11eb-80d8-e49540b97bc1.png)

**Describe the solution you'd like**
As an option let's see if we can end the parent workflows with a Failure event rather than `ContinuedAsNew`

**Describe alternatives you've considered**

**Additional context**
https://community.temporal.io/t/how-to-tell-when-a-cron-scheduled-workflow-failed/2097
title: Surface Cron workflows Failure status instead of ContinuedAsNew
